ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: video cards
ygData.msgSnippet: I think it s actually 768 megs for WinME...and don t ever let anyone tell you that ME s not suitable for EQ. My primary EQ box for over 3 years has been a 450
ygData.messageBody:
I think it's actually 768 megs for WinME...and don't ever let anyone tell you that ME's not suitable for EQ. My primary EQ box for over 3 years has been a 450 mhz k6-3 box with 256 megs ram, that ran ME. Rock solid, reliable, no compatibility issues...it's great. ME has never given me anything like the problems I've seen others talk about. Only time it ever acted up is when the cpu fan was failing....obviously not the OS's fault.
----- Original Message -----
From: Justin
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, January 07, 2003 10:16 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: video cards

    I have 512 mb ram not 412.  I am using win me not xp or 200 or even 98.  I was told that if I put more than 740 mb ram my sytem will slow down due to windows not being able handle a super amount of ram.  just what I have be told by compouter techs.  well see evryone on Norrath.
